Name: Recessed lighting in suspended ceiling - no independent support wires

GeneralInformation.Description: 2ft by 4ft lighting fixture recessed in a suspended ceiling.  Fragility is for casualty evaluation only.  Ceiling lighting cost consequence has been included in the suspended ceiling fragilities.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: User to provide median demand and dispersion values.  The values listed are default PACT values and do not represent the response of this component.  This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data.  Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.
